snippet: The Israelis and the Palestinians will soon have to decide whether they want to go deeper into peace talks.
abstract: Editorial credits Secretary of State John Kerry for publicly forcing both Israelis and Palestinians to face the consequences if the peace process fails; notes even if the two sides agree on basic principles, they still face the tougher task of translating those principles into a final deal.
lead_paragraph: The Israelis and the Palestinians will soon have to decide whether they want to go deeper into peace talks.

headline.main: Closing In on Basic Mideast Principles
headline.print_headline: Closing In on Basic Mideast Principles
